runs.comm: starts with a wide, swinging down the leg side, Akmal misses his leg-side flick and Pakistan are off

well, you get a sense this could fizzle out too quickly, Pakistan need almost 10 an over, this is full outside off, Akmal clears his front leg and slices it away off the outside edge down to Steve Smith on the third man boundary, who snaffles it easily enough
what a lovely shot, all timing and placement, no brutality at all, full and outside off and Hafeez pushed it through the covers for four
a touch shorter this time, Hafeez rocking back and trying to pull it away, gets it high on the bat and it trickles to midwicket
on off stump this time, Hafeez is back and across and defending into the off side, good bowling from Nannes
tight line again, hovering around middle and off on a good length, Hafeez attempting to flick this into the leg side, can't get it away
touch to short and Hafeez takes advantage, flicking wristily backward of square on the leg side for four
Tait is into the action and launches a sharp, vicious bouncer that whizzes past Butt's ear, sadly a wide in this format
much fuller this time, on off stump, Butt gets forward and pushes hurriedly into the off side
full again, this time on leg stump, Butt flicks it though midwicket, not quite timing it perfectly, and collects a couple
good from Tait, tight line and good length, Butt pushes it away to a deep-set mid on fielder for one
strange shot this from Hafeez, attempting a drive on the up from this back of a length delivery outside off stump, can only find fresh air
touch shorter this, and Hafeez just flinches at it outside off, nothing shot, and it zips through to Haddin
oops, slower ball that slips out of Tait's hands at beamer height, but it is harmless and down the leg side
back on a length and line this time, and a whole lot quicker, Hafeez jumps back and defends in a hurry, top bowling
Nannes finds a tidy line on off stump, just back of a length, Butt tries to force it into the leg side but gets nothing on it
well the shot was born of desperation, but executed very well, Butt skips leg side to give himself room and thrashes it through point for four
nothing on this one, back on to a good line and length, Butt in his crease and defending
this is an excellent shot, all wrists and placement, fullish on off stump and flashed in front of point for four
and again! lovely shot, gets inside the line and flashes his wrists at a full ball, square through the off side for another boundary
looks like Butt may have briefly rattled Nannes here, who shoves this well down the leg side for a wide, Haddin can't  collect so they run an extra
good ball to finish a damaging over, Hafeez works it from middle to midwicket
all action here, Butt wondering leg side to give himself room, Tait follows him and bangs it in short, Butt attempts a half-blinded pull shot and misses

Tait strikes this time! Similar to the last ball, Butt trying to give himself room, Tait follows him with a bouncer, the attempted pull this time gets high on the bat and loops gently to Hussey at mid on, Pakistan in real trouble
this time it's outside off stump, worked calmly into the off side for no run
full and outside off, Hafeez swishes, misses and the umpire decides it's a fraction too far outside off and calls wide
back on to a tight line, Hafeez in very orthodox position just stroking it gently into the covers
nothing on offer here, Tait has really found his range, good length, good line, Hafeez defends
suddenly a big shot attempted from Hafeez, bunts this from outside off stump over mid on for a boundary, not timed perfectly but much-needed runs
Mitchell Johnson is the new man, and he's pretty swift too, arrowed in on to middle and worked away for a single
well that's the end for Hafeez. Short and pulled firmly, actually timing it very well, but straight to Hussey at deep square, pretty tame end really, and things are in danger of unravelling here
good ball this, outside off and Umar opens the face, guiding it away for a bristling single down to third man
bonus run here for Pakistan, and they will need plenty more, shoved down the leg side
shortish and very casually worked away down to fine leg for a single by Misbah
another good ball from Johnson, finds a good line and length, Umar content to push it into the off side
tidy end to a tidy over, pushed away towards point from a back-of-a-length delivery
full and Umar drives it firmly, without quite timing it well enough to beat mid off
good ball from Watson, shorter and sharper, Umar attempts a big hook shot, gets high and the bat and balloons away for a couple in the midwicket region
on a length and Umar has brilliantly smashed this, timed perfectly over the midwicket boundary where a policeman sticks out a hand and takes it easily in the stands, top shot
this time it's just a single, worked away into space
not much Misbah can do here, defending into the off side
nicely done here from Misbah, just turning his wrists over the ball, and working it down to fine leg for a couple
David Hussey into the attack and Umar attempts a lashing cut, but misses it entirely
gets more bat on this, and it goes to the point fielder
another play and miss, back of a length, big cut shot attempted but missed
more careful here, and pushed away for a single
oh dear, that's a horrible looking shot, down on one knee and attempting to reverse-poke this misses and no run
this time he stands up and pushes it down the ground for a single
Michael Clarke slings this into around the off stump, attempted cut shot, trickles out to the point fielder
gets all of this! Misbah swings his arms through the line of the ball and nails it over midwicket for six!
two more here, working it into the off side from a shortish delivery
Misbah finding his range a little more, pushing it away for a single
Umar still content to watch the ball carefully and nurdle it into the leg side for a single towards deep midwicket
what a lovely shot this is, Misbah skips down the wicket and drives, conventionally and beautifully for a boundary
Umar greets him with a delicate sweep, bit of a nothing shot, dabbed away to short fine leg for  a couple
another attempted dab shot, to what would have been a full toss, so Umar ends up getting nothing from a loose ball
oh dear, all over for Umar, this time giving himself room and swiping at it horridly outside off stump, ends up slicing it to Hussey at deep point who juggles before securing the catch
short ball to Misbah, pulls it away for a single to deep midwicket
Afridi sweeps his first ball, timing it well enough  but straight to the fielder on the midwicket boundary
fullish delivery Misbah can't get much of it and another dot
better connection this time, swiped away towards cow corner for a couple
Johnson back to Afridi, and he's so excited that he falls over as he delivers, it's still a good ball and beats an attempted defensive shot from Afridi
good ball on a good length, Afridi gets back and defends into the off side, collects a single
fuller this time outside off stump, Misbah drives carefully, but it comes off the edge anyway and goes down to third man
no ball from Johnson, outside off, which Afridi plays and misses at, but excitingly this means it's a free hit
looked like a slower ball from Johnson, it was short, Afridi hung back and tried to mow it away through midwicket, couldn't time it at all and collects a couple
well, if Afridi did connect with this it would have ended up well out the ground, as it was, he swished manically at thin air as a full ball passed through to Haddin
gets more bat on this, but not much more, leading edge loops down to mid off
touch of turn here but from a very short length, Afridi have himself some room and trashed it through the cover for four
good shot here, skipping down the track and timing it firmly past long on for four
excellent shot! Gives himself some room and murders it over cover for six, quality shot, looked like he didn't time it but it flew
this time more careful, driving along the ground through cover for one
Misbah content to work it away, while Afridi is booming he just needs to rotate the strike
another big offside flay attempted, but it goes out to the deep cover fielder
Watson back and Afridi attempting an ambitious leg-side flick, doesn't time it at all and collects one to deep square
Misbah attempting to manufacture a shot, shuffling around his crease, but ends up collecting one
good stuff from Afridi! Down on one knee and scooping this length ball over his shoulder for a boundary
well he's swinging hard at it, but not really timing this length ball, gets it down to mid on for one
Misbah rotates the strike calmly here, driving towards deep cover to get his captain back on strike
Afridi down on one knee again, this is well outside off stump though, so the leg-side scoop is harder to pull off, as it is, it comes off the boot into the off side where Haddin fields
Johnson is back, replacing Smith after that expensive last over, Afridi is already in more trouble, swishing wildly and missing outside off
this was much more in Afridi's hitting arc, on a length and outside off, but he could only drive it down to the deep cover fielder
not great fielding this from Tait, Misbah worked a leg-side ball down to short fine leg where Tait tumbled and fumbled and allowed a couple
good ball again, into the body, Misbah just turns it into the leg side for one, gets Afridi on strike who needs to do some damage off these last two balls
good from Johnson, slower ball that Afridi didn't spot at all, ends up fencing at it outside off stump and misses
good end to an excellent over from Johnson, full and straight Afridi drives down to long off and collect a lung-busting couple
Misbah is once again content to work the powerhouse Tait down to third man for a single, to set up a manic looking Afridi v Tait clash
slower ball from Tait, Afridi hoiks madly at it, swinging himself off his feet, but doesn't time it and collects one to midwicket
Misbah walks outside leg, and Tait follows him like a school bully, in the end Misbah can't do much and mistimes it away into the leg side
good bouncer here, very sharp, Afridi threw everything at a pull shot but it was through him in a flash
full toss here from Tait, it looked quite high, Afridi ended up clubbing it down to long on for a couple, Afridi thought it was a no-ball, but the umpire disagreed
all over now! Full and Afridi attempted to thrash it away but it came off the pads and cannoned on to the stumps, very ambitious shot that didn't come off
Misbah steadily works this away calmly, Pakistan need more but maybe he's timing his innings well
gets a run this time, full and squeezed into the covers for one
Razzaq needs to do something special but at the moment all he can do is push this into covers for one
full again from Nannes, Misbah chips it down to long on, one bounce, for another single

Nannes gets another, and Razzaq departs. That may be it for Pakistan. Full and straight, Razzaq tries to thrash it over long off but doesn't get nearly enough of it and Warner catches it on the boundary
very good ball from Nannes, yorker and Misbah jabs a bat down on it, they collect a sharp single
Watson is back and landing this up and around off stump, driven to the cover for a gentle single
this will not do Australia any harm, driven carefully into the cover region for a quiet single
full toss from Watson, Misbah can't get it away, driving down the ground for a single
slower-ball bouncer that loops up over Fawad Alam, misses the hook shot, and Haddin collects
this time it's floated up outside off, Fawad Alam drives at it without timing and can only collect one towards the covers
another single from Misbah, he really needs to up the rate a touch, working it away into the off side for one
That's more like it, full and cleanly struck from Misbah, timed perfectly down the ground for six
Nannes strikes back immediately! Misbah giving himself room looking to repeat the dose, but only succeeds it skying to mid off, who runs back and completes an excellent catch
not much on offer here, full and straight and driven for one
bang on a length and line, Aamer hops back and works it towards cover for a single
angled into to Fawad Alam's legs, and he just helps it on it's way, timing it very well and it flies all the way for six
this time it's outside off stump, Fawad Alam attempts an ugly-looking swipe, gets a bottom edge through to Haddin on the bounce
David Hussey back and landing this outside off, attempting flay through the off side is not timed very well,  and they collect one
lovely shot this from Fawad Alam, just placed it through extra cover, didn't look like it had much on it but it raced to the boundary
this time it's worked more gently away into the covers for a single
slower and wider from Hussey, Aamer tries to fetch it but only succeeds in bunting down to mid off who collects an easy catch, the sting has long-since departed from this contest
neatly done from Fawad Alam, who looks a decent bat, working it away for a single
Sami negotiates his first ball pushing into the off side for a swift single, good over from Hussey
Sami stays very still in his crease and guides this away for a single down to third man
wild wish from Fawad Alam, doesn't time it very well, but gets one to midwicket
this is very tame, full and pushed into the covers, simple single for Sami
lovely catch! Fawad Alam swung hard at this down to long on, where Clarke skipped in and took an excellent catch diving forward
Sami once again working it away for an easy single, good stuff from Johnson
good end to a good over, Saeed Ajmal can't get it away
Tait to finish up here, full and straight, Sami knocks it away for a single into the off side
short this time, Saeed Ajmal attempts a big hook shot but finds nothing and Haddin collects
this is through Saeed Ajmal pretty quickly, gets a bottom edge an a leg-side swipe, which Haddin collects very smartly
fuller this time and Saeed Ajmal gets much more on this, driving down the ground for a couple
just gets away with this, Saeed Ajmal gives himself plenty of room and leading-edges it just past mid off for a couple`
gone, all over. Saeed Ajmal gives himself room, Tait fires in a quick yorker and that is that. The players shake hands, Australia look very content, and they have been completely dominant today.
